titleStmt.title: Two speeches the one spoken by Sir Audley Mervin, speaker of the honourable House of Commons, upon the reception and return of James, Duke of Ormond, Lord-Lieutenant of Ireland, July 27, 1662 : the other at His Graces entrance into the Castle of Dublin by Mr. Norris Jephson.
titleStmt.author: Mervyn, Audley, Sir, d. 1675.

notesStmt.note: All after p. 14 lacking. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
